attributes.action: Employment of Homeless trade training, written into Buckingham Palace contracts.
attributes.background: Homeless People renovating Buckingham Place. Chance to help homeless and others to train for trades and skills that will empower them.   Get this pushed forward to be debated in Westminster, so that part of all Buckingham Palace renovation contracts employ and trade train homeless.

rejection.details: The terms of contracts of employment at Buckingham Palace are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
